p: In order to identify the components of the EO, the linear retention index (LRI) of each constituent was calculated according to Van Den Dool and Kratz [ 36] and compared to literature, together with the corresponding mass spectrum (see Table 1). LRIs were calculated through the homologous series of linear alkanes, using a mixture from n-nonane to n-pentacosane ( n-nonane purity was 99% from BDH, Dubai, UAE. C 10â€“C 25 purity was 99% from Sigma-Aldrich, St. Louis, MO, USA).
